issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

versions.description: Windows Platform Support, ListView updates, Vector overlays in maps
versions.name: Release 4.1.0

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

Intermittently when building to device I am getting the following printed out in the console when the build process attempts to launch the app {{ ERROR 0x81030136}}.
I have only seen this issue on once machine so far.
I have looked up the error and it has lead to these 

https://bugreports.qt.io/browse/QTBUG-42950
http://issuetracker.unity3d.com/issues/deployment-to-wp8-dot-1-sometimes-fails

h5.Steps to reproduce

*This only happens Intermittently*

1. Build a Windows Platform project for device

h5.Actual result

During the launching of the app the error will be printed, the app will not launch

h5.Expected result

There should be no errors
fields.summary: Windows: Intermittent error when CLI is launching app onto device
fields.environment:
Windows 8.1
Appc CLI (NPM): 4.1.0-1
Appc CLI (Registry): 4.1.0-4
Ti SDK: 4.1.0.v20150701120122
Appc Studio: 4.1.0.201507010234

comments.body: Closing, as we are going to drop 8.1 support. Please create new ticket if this is still the case.
Closing old "Won't fix" tickets. If you disagree, please reopen.
